speaker: Family Vault
lines: You step into a family vault lined with marble biers.
A ledger sits open on a stand.
Portrait plates hang on the walls, faces dulled by patina.
A ring lies on the floor where someone dropped it.
In the corner, the air moves strangely.
The movement quickens when you breathe.
Dried marks stain a page in the ledger.

choices.text: Face what stirs between the pages.
Read the ledger aloud, name by name.
Seal the door with salt and withdraw.
